subject: Soccer
Refugees and Displaced Persons
lead_paragraph: Mohammed Jaddou, 17, once the captain of Syria’s under-16 national team, is now a refugee, training in Germany after what he described as a frightening 3,500-mile journey across land and sea.
snippet: Mohammed Jaddou, 17, once the captain of Syria’s under-16 national team, is now a refugee, training in Germany after what he described as a frightening 3,500-mile journey across land and sea.
